snippet: An unconfirmed report of a person wearing Ku Klux Klan regalia followed a month of incidents of hate speech and vandalism on the campus of Oberlin College in Ohio.
abstract: Police in Oberlin, Ohio, are so far unable to confirm a report of a person wearing a white robe and hood that caused Oberlin College to cancel classes in favor of a teach-in; daylong discussion of racism had already been planned following a wave of messages and fliers left around campus with racist, anti-Semitic and anti-gay slurs.
lead_paragraph: An unconfirmed report of a person wearing Ku Klux Klan regalia followed a month of incidents of hate speech and vandalism on the campus of Oberlin College in Ohio.

headline.seo: Oberlin Cancels Classes After Reported Klan Sighting
headline.main: Police Unsure of Klan Garb at Troubled College
headline.print_headline: Police Unsure of Klan Garb at Troubled College
